name: Ninja Run (itch) (Gwilym and Michael)
description:
Controls

Press the "A" key to move the character left.
Press the "D" key to move the character right.

Press the space bar to make the character jump.
The longer you hold space the higher/longer you will jump for.

Press mouse left click to attack enemies.
When you attack you have three opportunity's to hit an enemy throughout each attack.
The archer enemies have three health.
The long sword enemies have six health.
The armored enemies have eight health.

When you get hit by an enemy you take one damage.
You have three health and if your health reaches zero you die
If you touch a spike you instantly die.

Your goal is to touch the flag at the end of the level.
